group_1.narration: Kamihama has been engulfed in chaos@over the [textYellow:Kimochi] Stones.
As Magical Girls clashed with each other@time and time again, an unforeseen@disaster descended upon the city...

group_1.textLeft: Iroha! What's going on?!

group_1.textCenter: Yeah, everyone was surprised when you@called us all of a sudden.

group_1.textRight: There are Witches in Chuo Ward!
Then we ought to defeat them, but I expected@the situation would be more urgent than that.

group_1.textLeft: That's the weird thing, though...
Apparently, a lot of them suddenly appeared@all at once, and only in Chuo!

group_1.textRight: What?! Really?
If a whole bunch of Witches are concentrated in one@area, we should be able to detect them with magic....

group_1.textLeft: What surprises me are the inconceivable@circumstances that were involved.

group_1.textRight: What do you mean, inconceivable?

group_1.textLeft: From what I've been told, they've been@coming out of Endless Mirrors.

group_1.textRight: Seriously?!
Does that mean the Witches are coming@from outside the city?!
Huh? How's that?

group_1.textLeft: She means that they can warp to Kamihama...
...from other places by going through@Endless Mirrors.

group_1.textRight: Oh...
I guess the Labyrinths for the main Witch and its@offshoots are all hooked up together, and that's@how those other Witches wound up here.

group_1.textLeft: Exactly.

group_1.textRight: If we don't stop it,
the Magical Girls from other towns might@think...
...we're stealing their Witches again...

group_1.textLeft: That inconvenience is the LEAST of our problems!

group_1.textRight: Huh...?
It seems like the biggest problem to me...

group_1.textLeft: Even that is an optimistic assessment.
We fear that Endless Mirrors is connected@not only to distant lands,
but also to the past and future, and to@parallel worlds.
Although it cannot be said for certain,
an assumption as such can be made given@Kamihama's current state of affairs.

group_1.textRight: So the Witches that appeared in Chuo Ward@came from the past or future...?
Does that mean we have to fight them?

group_1.textLeft: That's right, Ui, but there are other problems, too.

group_1.textCenter: Well...I'll just give you a quick rundown.

group_1.narration: "Is the universe in which we live in one@[textRed:where the past and future are continuous,]@or is it one@[textBlue:where they fork into creating parallel worlds?]"
"Truth be told, the answer to that question@remains unknown to humanity to this day,@even to a genius like me."
"That means we now have to deal with the Witches@while also keeping an eye out for problems@brought on by the intersection of either@[textRed:the past and future,] or [textBlue:parallel worlds.]"

group_1.textRight: I see...
I understand that this is a much bigger@problem than I realized.

group_1.textLeft: Um, Touka...
What sort of problems could that cause?

group_1.textCenter: I was just about to explain.
Based on the assumptions we made earlier,@there are three problems that concern us:

group_1.narration: "Number 1: The enemies may be far stronger@and more numerous than what we're used to@in our world."
"The Witches from these other timelines may be so@powerful that Coordination is ineffective.@Furthermore, if they come from parallel worlds,@it means we'll have to face large numbers of them."

"This concerns problems that occur@when there are incongruities between@the past and future. For example, if I were to go way@back in time and kill my own dad, that means@I wouldn't be born. That would be strange, right?"
"Following that line of thinking,@if we in the present defeat a Witch that originally@appeared in the past, the possible effects it'll have@are completely unknown."
"And for the third and final one..."

group_1.textCenter: This is total nonsense. Can you explain it, Nemu?

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: It's a complete fantasy.

group_1.textRight: *Sigh*

group_1.narration: "Let's suppose that Subject A from a@parallel world in the future saves us, and then @their self from that same world in the past@is somehow killed."

"In that case, Subject A -@the future entity who saved us - will disappear.@The fact that we were saved, however, will remain true,@thus causing a contradiction similar to that@of a typical time paradox."

group_1.textLeft: Look, if that were to happen, either new timelines@would be created, or a time paradox would occur.
It's impossible for both to happen at once.
So if Subject A comes from a parallel world,@they won't disappear.

group_1.textRight: All we know for certain is that the universe in@which we live in has the potential to go either way.
I'm sure you're aware of that.

group_1.textLeft: I guess what Nemu is trying to articulate...
is that if we assume parallel worlds operate@ with the same characteristics as ours,
then all this becomes a big complicated@morass of multiple universes.
A time paradox alone would be a huge problem,
so I don't think there's any point in imagining@more than that.

group_1.textCenter: Okay, okay! Just tell us what we gotta do!

group_1.textLeft: I have no idea, though. Sorry! *Giggle*

group_1.textRight: Ngaah?!

group_1.textLeft: See, we can't properly deal with the Witches@that have appeared here...
...if we don't even know where they@originated from.

group_1.textRight: In other words, we first need to uncover@the source of these Witches.

group_1.textLeft: Bingo!

group_1.textRight: I wonder, though...is there any way we@can figure that out?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I hope there is...
Oh, that's my phone... It's Madoka.

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah, she and the others were supposed@to visit Kamihama today.

group_1.textLeft: I had promised we would all hang out together,@but now we'll need to cancel that...

group_1.textRight: I think you should also tell her to steer clear@of the city for now.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I should.
Um, hello, is this Madoka?

group_1.textRight: *Sigh* What are we supposed to do…?

group_1.textLeft: I thought it would be as simple as defeating@any other Witch,
but with all this talk about time paradoxes@occurring by defeating them...
We'll have to be very careful.
Huh?

group_1.textRight: I-It looks like Madoka and her friends@are in Chuo Ward right now.
She said they fought a Witch there!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100770:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
Really?!

group_1.textRight: She said it was exactly like a Witch in Mitakihara@that escaped from them a long time ago!
